Package yizhong.ding.mavendependencydownloader

Class DependencyResolver

java.lang.Object
yizhong.ding.mavendependencydownloader.DependencyResolver
public class DependencyResolver
extends java.lang.Object
This plays the role of resolving the dependencies of an input artifact and downloads them on a given directory.
Author:
Yizhong Ding

  • Method Details

    • resolveArtifact

      public static java.util.List<Artifact> resolveArtifact​(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String artifactId, java.lang.String version, java.lang.String downloadPath) throws ArtifactResolveException
      This method resolve the dependencies of a given artifact coordinate and store the Jar files on the given path.
      Parameters:
      groupId - groupId of the target artifact
      artifactId - artifactId of the target artifact
      version - version of the target artifact
      downloadPath - directory to store the dependencies
      Returns:
      returns a list of dependency Artifacts
      Throws:
      ArtifactResolveException - throw ArtifactResolveException if the inputs are not valid

    • resolveArtifact

      public static java.util.List<Artifact> resolveArtifact​(Artifact artifact, java.lang.String downloadPath) throws ArtifactResolveException
      Overloaded method of previous. See javadoc above.
      Parameters:
      artifact - as the target artifact to collect with all transitive dependencies.
      downloadPath - directory to store the dependencies
      Returns:
      list of transitive dependency Artifacts (location on disk)
      Throws:
      ArtifactResolveException - throw ArtifactResolveException if fail to resolve Artifact

    • resolveDependencies

      public static java.util.List<Artifact> resolveDependencies​(Artifact target, java.lang.String downloadPath) throws ArtifactResolveException
      The methods plays the roles of traversing the dependency graph of the given artifact and downloading the artifacts as jar files. It utilizes a BFS algorithm to traverse the dependency graph.
      Parameters:
      target - the target Artifact
      downloadPath - as the location where tha resolved JARs should be stored on disk.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of successfully downloaded artifacts.
      Throws:
      ArtifactResolveException - if fail to resolve dependencies.

    • traverseDependencyNode

      public static void traverseDependencyNode​(java.util.Set<Artifact> downloaded, java.util.Queue<Artifact> queue, java.lang.String downloadPath, java.util.Set<Artifact> excludedDependencies) throws ArtifactResolveException
      Helper method that visits dependency Graph nodes.
      Parameters:
      downloaded - downloaded a set of successfully downloaded Artifacts
      queue - queue used for BFS traverse the dependency graph
      downloadPath - downloadPath path to store Jar files
      excludedDependencies - the set used to
      Throws:
      ArtifactResolveException - if fail to resolve dependency

    • download

      public static void download​(Artifact artifact, java.lang.String downloadPath) throws ArtifactResolveException, java.io.IOException
      The method plays the role of downloading Artifact.
      Parameters:
      artifact - The maven artifact to be downloaded.
      downloadPath - The path to store Jar files.
      Throws:
      ArtifactResolveException - Throw an exception if it fails to fetch the Jar file online.
      java.io.IOException - Throw an exception if it fails to write the file.

    • removeExclusion

      public static void removeExclusion​(Artifact artifact, java.lang.String downloadPath) throws ArtifactResolveException
      The method plays the role of deleting Artifact file on a give path.
      Parameters:
      artifact - target artifact.
      downloadPath - given path.
      Throws:
      ArtifactResolveException - throw exception if deletion fails.
